articles.title: Ukraine live briefing: Zelensky vows response after Chernihiv strike kills 7; drone strikes in Russia - The Washington Post
articles.description: The attack on a theater in Chernihiv, some 80 miles north of Kyiv, left at least 7 dead and injured more than 140 people.
articles.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said that the military would respond tangibly to an attack on the northern city of Chernihiv, which killed at least seven people, including a 6-year-old child. … [+5429 chars]

articles.title: Russia reports ‘abnormal situation’ as Luna-25 tries to begin moon landing - The Guardian
articles.description: Roscosmos says spacecraft got in trouble while attempting to enter a pre-landing orbit targeting south pole
articles.content:
Russia has reported an abnormal situation on its moon-bound Luna-25 spacecraft, which launched earlier this month.

articles.description: One prostate cancer patient says he was forced to carry used "nappies" around in a backpack.
articles.content:
Prostate cancer patients have described the "horrendous" experience of urinary incontinence as a result of surgery.
